comments:

It appears that this is also causing our breakpoint listener tests to fail
because the tests get a breakpointChanged callback during the add.

Fixed. Changed the options manager to only update the message on breakpoints 
that are added without a message (this means that we avoid the update at 
startup when breakpoints are loaded with persisted messages).

Updated the tests to ignore change callbakcs.

traces.message: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
